actionParams.description: hashed token, built of sha1 on current KS concatenated with the application token
actionParams.name: tokenHash

actionParams.description: session user id, will be ignored if a different user id already defined on the application token
actionParams.name: userId

actionParams.description: session type, will be ignored if a different session type already defined on the application token
actionParams.name: type

actionParams.description: session expiry (in seconds), could be overwritten by shorter expiry of the application token and the session-expiry that defined on the application token
actionParams.name: expiry

description: Starts a new KS (kaltura Session) based on application authentication token id
